positive.title: First Mover Asia: BTC, ETH Stable While COMP and AAVE in the Red
positive.description: Curve Founder Michael Egorov's $168M in holdings is under stress, imperiling DeFi as a whole. PLUS: The Litecoin Foundation and crypto cold-storage card manufacturer Ballet HAVE teased a sale of 500 collectable cards – fashioned from 50 grams of fine silver.

positive.title: Etihad Airways 'Horizon Club' Web3 Loyalty Program Will Let You Stake NFTs for Miles
positive.description: Holders of its EY-ZERO1 NFT collection will be able to lock up their assets to earn Etihad miles that can be redeeed on real-world flights and upgrades.

positive.title: Bitcoin Lingers Near $29.2K, as Investors Mull Latest Industry Woes; CRV Sinks 12.5%
Judge rejects motion to dismiss Terraform case, disagrees with Ripple decision
positive.description: Judge Jed Rakoff gave a detailed interpretation of the Howey test that was at odds with the decision in the Securities and Exchange’s case against Ripple.

positive.title: Republican candidate wants to end President Biden’s supposed ‘war on Bitcoin’ if elected
positive.description: “As president, on day one, CBDC goes into the trash can — we’re not going to allow it," said Ron DeSantis at a New Hampshire campaign event.

positive.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
positive.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

positive.title: US crypto bills on the move, Worldcoin launches and Russia’s CBDC: Hodler’s Digest, July 23-29
positive.description: Crypto legislation goes to the House floor in the U.S., Worldcoin’s controversial launch and Russia’s digital ruble signed into law.

negative.title: Nomura Backs $6M Round for On-Chain Fund Platform Solv Protocol
negative.description: The Singapore-based startup offers an on-chain fund platform that allows institutions and venture capitalists to create, use and sell financial products.

negative.title: Curve Founder’s $168M Stash Is Under Stress, Creating a Risk for DeFi as a Whole
negative.description: Curve CEO Michael Egorov pledged 34% of CRV’s total market cap to back loans across DeFi protocols. A forced liquidation would result in selling at a time when prices are already falling.

negative.title: Judge Rejects Ripple Ruling Precedent in Denying Terraform Labs' Motion to Dismiss SEC Lawsuit
negative.description: A federal judge rejected Terraform Labs' motion to dismiss a lawsuit filed by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.

negative.title: ‘Let's just diversify and see' — Binance CEO on its stablecoin strategy
negative.description: Due to regulatory and transparency risks, CZ says that spreading risk across different stablecoins is the key to longevity.

negative.title: BALD token developer denies rug pull as price falls 85% post-launch
negative.description: The BALD memecoin collapsed in price as collectors alleged an exit scam, but the developer claims not to have sold any coins.

negative.title: SEC files complaint against Hex founder for allegedly offering unregistered securities
negative.description: According to the SEC, Richard Heart allegedly used more than $12 million of investor funds to buy “a 555-carat diamond, expensive watches, and high-end automobiles.”
